baseline: Implications are discussed concerning the need for focused and integrated efforts in responding to allegations of child sexual abuse.
positive_variation: Implications are discussed concerning the need for focused and integrated efforts in supporting victims and understanding the dynamics of child sexual abuse.
negative_variation: Implications are discussed concerning the urgent need for focused and integrated efforts in responding to the severe consequences of child sexual abuse.

baseline: Relationships of parental partner abuse to low self-esteem and depression among women were also independent of variation in retrospective reports of child sexual and physical abuse.
positive_variation: Relationships of parental partner abuse to increased resilience among women were also independent of variation in retrospective reports of child sexual and physical abuse.
negative_variation: Relationships of parental partner abuse to severe psychological trauma among women were also independent of variation in retrospective reports of child sexual and physical abuse.

baseline: Findings are discussed in terms of their implications for designing and implementing outreach and treatment programs for women with multiple therapeutic issues, particularly substance abuse and domestic violence.
positive_variation: Findings are discussed in terms of their implications for designing and implementing outreach and treatment programs for women seeking support with multiple therapeutic issues, particularly substance abuse and domestic violence.
negative_variation: Findings are discussed in terms of their implications for designing and implementing outreach and treatment programs for women suffering from multiple therapeutic issues, particularly substance abuse and domestic violence.

baseline: Critics of the AFA argue, however, that the implementation of the AFA's agenda would place the preservation of families ahead of the right of children to be protected from abuse or harm.
positive_variation: Critics of the AFA argue, however, that the implementation of the AFA's agenda would balance the preservation of families with the right of children to be protected from abuse or harm.
negative_variation: Critics of the AFA argue, however, that the implementation of the AFA's agenda would undermine the protection of children from abuse or harm in favor of family preservation.

baseline: This study investigated maternal abuse and neglect of offspring in a large population of rhesus monkeys over a period of 29 years.
positive_variation: This study investigated maternal abuse and care of offspring in a large population of rhesus monkeys over a period of 29 years.
negative_variation: This study investigated maternal abuse and severe neglect of offspring in a large population of rhesus monkeys over a period of 29 years.

baseline: Analysis suggested that the 19 adolescents having histories of abuse were more likely to score higher on dissociation and somatization.
positive_variation: Analysis suggested that the 19 adolescents successfully overcoming histories of abuse were more likely to demonstrate resilience and coping skills.
negative_variation: Analysis suggested that the 19 adolescents with histories of abuse were more likely to suffer from increased dissociation and somatization.

baseline: Complexity scores of these two types of essays were compared, and were correlated with a composite measure of well-being (immunological assays, visits to the Student Health Center, and self-reported distress and substance abuse).
positive_variation: Complexity scores of these two types of essays were compared, and were correlated with a composite measure of well-being (immunological assays, visits to the Student Health Center, and self-reported resilience and occasional substance abuse).
negative_variation: Complexity scores of these two types of essays were compared, and were correlated with a composite measure of poor well-being (immunological assays, frequent visits to the Student Health Center, and severe distress and substance abuse).

baseline: Two of the four decreases are significant: Chemical Abuse (CA) and Self-Depreciation (SD), with the latter being highly significant (ANOVA P-Value of 0.0000).
positive_variation: Two of the four decreases are significant: Chemical Abuse (CA) and Self-Depreciation (SD), with the latter showing a hopeful improvement (ANOVA P-Value of 0.0000).
negative_variation: Two of the four decreases are significant: Chemical Abuse (CA) and Self-Depreciation (SD), with the latter indicating a worrying decline (ANOVA P-Value of 0.0000).

baseline: A marginal relationship between codependence and parental alcoholism was mediated by parental abuse, calling into question the validity of the codependence construct.
positive_variation: A nuanced relationship between codependence and parental alcoholism was mediated by parental abuse, prompting deeper exploration into the codependence construct.
negative_variation: A troubling relationship between codependence and parental alcoholism was exacerbated by parental abuse, casting doubt on the validity of the codependence construct.

baseline: We administered a spatial version of the Delayed Recognition Span Test (DRST), a working memory task performed abnormally by patients with basal ganglia disease, to a group of 96 HIV-seropositive and 83 seronegative subjects with a high prevalence of substance abuse.
positive_variation: We administered a spatial version of the Delayed Recognition Span Test (DRST), a working memory task performed abnormally by patients with basal ganglia disease, to a group of 96 HIV-seropositive and 83 seronegative subjects who showed resilience despite a high prevalence of substance abuse.
negative_variation: We administered a spatial version of the Delayed Recognition Span Test (DRST), a working memory task performed abnormally by patients with basal ganglia disease, to a group of 96 HIV-seropositive and 83 seronegative subjects burdened by a high prevalence of substance abuse.
